description: Scheduled tasks for S3 Communicator heartbeat daemon

jobs.name: Morning Briefing
jobs.description: Summarize overnight beads changes, PR status, pending work
jobs.output: SendMessage to team-lead with morning briefing summary

jobs.name: End-of-Day Summary
jobs.description: Log day accomplishments and set next-day priorities
jobs.output: Retain to Hindsight + SendMessage to team-lead

jobs.name: Weekly Reflection
jobs.description: Deep reflection on patterns, consolidate weekly learning
jobs.output: Retain patterns to Hindsight + SendMessage to team-lead

jobs.name: Daily Session Distillation
jobs.description: Distill recent session narratives into consolidated patterns via Hindsight reflect
actions: Reflect with budget=high to synthesize cross-session patterns
Retain consolidated distillation to shared + private banks
jobs.output: Retain distillation summary to Hindsight (both banks)

job_tracking.description: Tracks last execution time per job to prevent duplicates

format.job_id: ISO-8601 timestamp of last successful run

active_hours.description: Cron jobs only fire during active hours unless marked critical

queue_lanes.description: Priority lanes for command processing. Lower number = higher priority.
